## createApp() function

创建应用

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createApp(appConfig: AppConfig): Elux.Component<{
    children: any;
}>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  appConfig | [AppConfig](./react-taro.appconfig.md) | 应用配置 |

<b>Returns:</b>

Elux.Component&lt;{ children: any; }&gt;

返回包含Provider组件

## Example


```js
render () {
  const Provider = createApp(appConfig);
  return <Provider>{this.props.children}</Provider>
}
```
